articles.title: Sony Strikes $457M Deal To Acquire Majority Stake In Peanuts Brand - Deadline
articles.description: Sony will acquire a majority stake in Peanuts Holdings Llc, the company behind the cartoon franchise that includes Charlie Brown, Snoopy and the gang.

articles.title: Bay Area Italian deli with roots going back a century has closed - SFGATE
articles.description: The Genova Delicatessen on Treat Boulevard in Walnut Creek has permanently closed after nearly 30 years.

articles.title: Paul King To Direct ‘Labubu’ Movie For Sony - Deadline
articles.description: Paul King is developing Sony Pictures and Pop Mart’s live-action Labubu film

articles.title: Disney’s Live-Action ‘Tangled:’ Sarah Catherine Hook, Teagan Croft, Freya Skye and Olivia-Mai Barrett Up for Rapunzel Role (Exclusive) - The Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: Milo Manheim and Charlie Gillespie are among the young men who have a dream to make it to the top of the tower as Disney tests actors for its next big adaptation.

articles.title: Jelly Roll pardoned by Tennessee governor for robbery, drug convictions - CBS News
articles.description: Jelly Roll had said a pardon would make it easier for him to travel internationally for concert tours and to perform Christian missionary work without requiring burdensome paperwork.

articles.title: San Francisco Giants buy historic Curran Theatre - San Francisco Chronicle
articles.description: Speaking to the Chronicle by phone, Giants President and CEO Larry Baer said, “We’re in the live entertainment business.”

articles.title: Wiz Khalifa sentenced to nine months jail in Romania - BBC
articles.description: The rapper, who has been sentenced in absentia, had admitted to smoking a cannabis joint on stage at a festival last year.

articles.title: Why BlackRock thinks the time is right for a more 'modernized' exposure to bonds - CNBC
articles.description: Amid a 'generational opportunity' in fixed income, BlackRock recently launched an ETF that it says has the most comprehensive exposure to the market ever.

articles.title: Chris Evans Returns for ‘Avengers: Doomsday’ as Captain America With a Child, Teaser Confirms - Variety
articles.description: Chris Evans is back as Captain America in 'Avengers: Doomsday,' the first teaser revealed.

articles.title: OSHA fines Universal after employee gets electrical shock at Epic Universe ride - Florida Politics
articles.description: A Universal employee was hospitalized with a dislocated shoulder, broken ribs and a fractured arm.

articles.title: Lucy Liu on 'Rosemead,' rejection and returning to Mandarin - NPR
articles.description: The child of Chinese immigrants, Liu didn't learn English until she was 5. She plays a terminally ill woman grappling with her teenage son's mental health crisis in Rosemead.

articles.title: SpongeBob SquarePants Biomes - Minecraft
articles.description: SpongeBob SquarePants is returning to Minecraft! Grab your spatula and get hyped up on Goofy Goober Sundaes as SpongeBob SquarePants Biomes is coming!

articles.title: ‘Power’s Naturi Naughton-Lewis & Bonko Khoza-Led Drama Series ‘The Nowhere Man’ Acquired By Starz - Deadline
articles.description: Starz has acquired the exclusive U.S. rights to the six-part drama The Nowhere Man, with Naturi Naughton-Lewis starring alongside lead Bonko Khoza.

articles.title: Mariah Carey’s ‘All I Want for Christmas Is You’ breaks an all-time chart record - NPR
articles.description: With Carey's enduring Christmas hit, we may be looking at a record that borders on the untouchable.

articles.title: Tom Cruise Is Unrecognizable in First Teaser for Highly Anticipated Comedy 'Digger' - MovieWeb
articles.description: Tom Cruise's epic new film from Alejandro González Iñárritu just got a first look and title announcement.

articles.title: From toddlers to teens, here's your one-stop shop for young readers - NPR
articles.description: If you have kids in your life who are ready to broaden their book horizons we have recommendations for you! Here you'll find tried-and-true picture books, chapter books, and YA, all published in 2025.

articles.title: Guy Ritchie’s ‘Young Sherlock’ Trailer Reimagines Detective for Prime Video - The Hollywood Reporter
